TopicTitle: Cannot see any stock/downloaded craft files.

Articles.Content:
Im using ksp x64 and now that ive finally downloaded B9 I tried some of the craft files only to find that there missing. They are indeed sitting in the appropriate folders but both the stock AND any downloaded craft files are not showing in the load screen. Only the craft that I've made. And now that I realize it this had been the case from the very beginning. I started this save file not long after .24 hit and gradually built it up overtime. And when I think about it there was never a single craft in my load screen other my own. So this has been going on for awhile now. Saying if its a certain mod is hard to say. So has anyone ever heard of this?

Here are some logs if they may help.

LOG

OUTPUT

Edited September 13, 2014 by Motokid600
Turn on the allow stock craft option, it's either in the game's menu or the Alt-F12 menu (I think the game's).
Wow, there it is in the alt-f12 menu.. go figure. I don't know how that got disabled. Thanks Nathan.
It's disabled by default in a career game.
